name: MeetingPackage.com
slogan: Book off-site meetings in a snap!
description:
MeetingPackage.com is a venue management software-as-a-service that enables hotels and other venues to sell meeting & event spaces with online availability and dynamic pricing from their own website and in thousands of other channels globally. It's about time to bring meeting and event sales to this millennium.

MeetingPackage.com - making meeting booking as easy as booking hotel rooms online.

team.name: Joonas Ahola
team.bioHtml: Started as an entrepreneur at the age of 14 and have founded 3 companies since. Have been working in hospitality and events for the past 8 years.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
MeetingPackage is a tech company, charged with the mission to help hoteliers selling their meeting rooms with the same ease as they can sell their bedrooms. With offices in Helsinki, London, Milan, and Prague, we’re backed by Hospitality and IT industry specialists. We work with unique venues to hotel chains, independent hotels and travel agencies.


We are looking for a backend developer with 1 - 4 years of experience in building web application / services. We are a great place to work and our company spirit is one of a true start-up. We believe in giving a lot of responsibility and freedom to our employees. We provide flexible working hours and remote work.



 Your main responsibilities will be to: 

Design, develop new services and improve our existing services

Ensure service scalability and reliability through effective code and database design

Working with different stakeholders to understand the requirements

Maintain and implementing new features for different projects

 Requirements: 

Good communication skills in English

Experience of working in modern PHP

Experience of working with both relational and non-relational database

Good to have some experience with cloud platforms

Experience of building RESTful API

Good to have some experience with at least one JavaScript framework

jobs.title: Frontend Developer(Intern)
jobs.description:
MeetingPackage is a tech company, charged with the mission to help hoteliers selling their meeting rooms with the same ease as they can sell their bedrooms. With offices in Helsinki, London, Milan, and Prague, we’re backed by Hospitality and IT industry specialists. We work with unique venues to hotel chains, independent hotels and travel agencies.
We are looking for a frontend developer who is motivated and passionate about building responsive websites using have interest in modern frameworks. We are a great place to work and our company spirit is one of a true start-up. We believe in giving a lot of responsibility and freedom to our employees. 

 Your main responsibilities will be to: 

Implement the UI

Use the best practices to guarantee the best quality and availability of the web applications

Maintain the company UI components between different projects 

Maintain and implementing new features for different projects

 Requirements: 

Good communication skills in English

Basic knowledge of at least one modern JavaScript framework(React, Vue or Angular)

Basic knowledge of version control system
